body.name: ENGPOW Accordion File Organizer,Fireproof Expanding File Folder with Multi Pockets,13 Pockets Document Organizer with Handle & Labels,Portable Home Travel Safe Storage for Letter A4 Files and More
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 43 mins
features: High-Quality Materials: Protect your files with ENGPOW fireproof accordion file organizer.It is made of 3-layered non-itchy silicone-coated fiberglass which withstand the temperature up to 2200℉.It has been passed by SGS TEST(UL94 VTM-0 Certified).Fireproof File Folder is fireproof＆Water-resistant,which can effectively protect your important documents in a fire,flood,and wet weather. They will further keep your files intact.Giving you time to save your important documents when disaster strikes

Accordion File Organize: A Safe Enough Folder to Keep Your Files. Say goodbye to cluttered files and disorganization with ENGPOW's file organizer folders. Compared with other folders,our fireproof folders is allows you to neatly store and classify letter/A4 files, receipts, cards, USB drives, pen, passports and more in a safe and orderly way. Perfect for daily file filing and storage.The Non-dusty material can prevent dust from sticking to the outside of our folder,always keep it neat and tidy.

Large Capacity: 14.2" x 10.4" x 2", Compared with other folders, our Accordian File Organizer adopts a multi-layer design that can meet all your storage needs.These include 13 accordion Pockets with labels(each expanding to 1.2 inches),1 zipper pocket,2 pen slot,6 card slots,4 small mesh bags,4 medium mesh bags,and 1 main pocket. You can securely store all your important documents and other items in this fireproof expanding file folder while effectively classifying and finding your files.

Innovative Humanized Design: Design with a strong grab handle for carrying everything you needed easily. Featuring a double zipper for convenient opening and closing,you won't have to worry about losing any important documents. The included colorful labels make categorizing your files effortless. The fireproof file folder is suitable for business, travel, office, school, home storage, you can be 100% sure that your important documents are in a safe place.

Trusted after sales service: In the event of an emergency, our fireproof accordion file organizer folders are lighter, easier to carry than fireproof safes and quick to grab and go. We only wish to present the best to customers,to protect your valuables.If there any quality problem, please feel free to let us know.We promise to arrange a REPLACEMENT or 100% REFUND immediately. Ready to respond within a 24 hour time,your suggestion has a great impact on the upgrade of our products.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose ENGPOW Fireproof Accordion File Organizer? Fireproof and Waterproof and Dust-proof: A Safe Enough Folder to Keep Your Files.Perfect protection for your important files.Compared with other folders, our Accordian File Organizer adopts a multi-layer design that can meet all your storage needs.The fireproof file folder is suitable for business, travel, office, school, home storage, you can be 100% sure that your important documents are in a safe place.In the event of an emergency, our fireproof accordion file organizer folders are lighter, easier to carry than fireproof safes and quick to grab and go.

Innovative Humanized Design Design with a strong grab handle for carrying everything you needed easily. Featuring a double zipper for convenient opening and closing,you won't have to worry about losing any important documents. The included colorful labels make categorizing your files effortless. The fireproof file folder is suitable for business, travel, office, school, home storage, you can be 100% sure that your important documents are in a safe place.

Product Features: 13 Individual Pockets：Perfect for letter & a4 sized papers 1 Zipper Pocket: Perfect for receipts,tickets,conpons,and so on 6 Card Solts: Perfect for bank cards,business cards 4 Small Mesh Bags: Perfect for your U disks 4 Medium Mesh Bags: Perfect for your passports,other documents,coupons and more 1 Main Pocket: Perfect for letter file folders,papers or the right size items Product Size: 14.2" x 10.4" x 2",not too big or bulky,easy to carry

A good choice for home ,office,travel Our original Intention: Accidents happen when we least expect, and there’s nothing more devastating than a fire that takes away valuable paperwork, personal information, pictures or achievements.That’s why we developed the fireproof folder- Protect your financials, personal information,document notebook, that won’t let you down when emergency strikes. Nothing is completely foolproof, but added protection is always a good ideaFireproof does not mean it could support endless fire exposure, please keep any fire exposure to the minimum.Do not immerse or wash the folder in liquid

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice gadget to keep organized
reviews.reviewText: As described on line. The plastic dividers could be a little heavier. I also wished it was a little more colorful, but the online description described it exactly as is. I do need help organizing my paperwork and this item sure will help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and convenient.
reviews.reviewText: I have always kept my most important things in an old briefcase to be able to grab in an emergency. The briefcase was easy to grab, but it was much larger, heavier and more disorganized with only 3 filing slots and a big open area.This case is designed with many small and large places to store various items and easily find them. Many of the slots are covered with mesh so that you can see where everything is, if you don't have them contained within the paper-sized alphabetical slots. I counted the individual "places" to store items. There are 14 separate places that fit documents, 9 mesh pockets ranging from very small to 1 pocket that has a zipper for the area and mesh on about 1/3 of the area. Then you have another 6 places for items like credit cards.When we travel, especially in our RV, we always grabbed the briefcase before, so that we have emergency items like our eyeglass prescriptions, our dogs' health records, various travel-related cards, and other odd personal items.This expanding folder will be a major improvement as the items are stored in a smaller, lighter and much more orderly fashion. I do feel that the covering has substance, and I believe that it will be much more fire-resistant than the briefcase we used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not fully fireproof
reviews.reviewText: So there's a waxy coating over most of it that seems to be fireproof/resistant to a lighter but the material around the zipper easily deforms to fire.I'd certainly prefer this to something that isn't made to prevent fire damage but I wouldn't rely on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great organizer with pockets/dividers for everything you have
reviews.reviewText: Not bad for $29.98. It isn't quite as firm and structured looking as the product photos. It is a little bit more loose, kind of like a cloth/zippered binder. I like this organizer though. I can keep documents and passports- there are dividers that can be velcroed to keep your documents secure. You can use the alphabetized tab labels or you could create your own tabs with different names/colors if you needed something else. There are a lot of pockets of various sizes, one with a zipper, some internal. The double zipper allows the organizer to lay flat, and you could also use a small lock hooking the two zipper tabs together to keep out prying eyes. The fact that it is fireproof, waterproof and dust proof is huge. It is easy transportable if you need to take your documents with you somewhere. This organizer is perfect for my needs!
